ygData.subject: Re: Nice group...? 100% PURE BULLSHIT!
ygData.msgSnippet: Very well, you are entitled to your own opinion, regardless as to how incorrect and biast it may be. Your opinions, however, should not be posted in this rpg.

Very well, you are entitled to your own opinion, regardless as to 
how incorrect and biast it may be. Your opinions, however, should 
not be posted in this rpg. Slights against people in the rpg, and 
outside of it, are not to be tolerated, especially when I know 
exactly the reason you posted this.

If people, moderators in fact, in the dbzsf rpg are willing to cut 
down one of their members due to likes and dislikes, then why would 
anyone ever join?

Also, I'd appreciate it if nobody bothered reply to this message, 
and any other messages regarding this topic, it isn't worthy of 
anyone's time.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Well, actually, ass kissing does go over well in NBW. I'm not 
that surprised you came on over to leave your lip imprints 
everywhere, Cassidy. You are queen of ass kissing. And you couldn't 
be more incorrect about the people here. The people here are 
complete asswipes who cannot resist putting my, Lurker and former 
member Hollywood Narrator's posts down. Well, not really me, because 
you all thought I was DEAD, eh? Well, if I was, it'd be better then 
this. This RPG has fallen from grace, and it ain't gonna get up. I 
used to be able to squeeze some fun out this RPG, but that time is 
gone. Ever since the restart, this RPG has been resisting the fact 
that it just needs to lie down in it's own grave that it's very own 
members and moderators have dug. The restart introduced brand new 
sparkling fresh rules! Like a 5 character limit! And what a crock of 
shit this was! I was going to leave then, but stayed anyway, because 
of my wanting to keep this RPG far from death. I realize now, that 
it isn't possible. Not when you have shit for brains like Cardhead 
and Airly here. And Airly, you bitch, in case you did not know, you 
introduced a new misery to my life in my time of being here. I have 
put up with your shitty English and god awful posts, filled with 
modes of ridiculous attacks and ignoring my attacks. I could not be 
happier as I bid you all a middle finger, with the exception of 
Lurker. I will remember this RPG, for being where I first met him. 
And before I go, I want to wish Airly a lightening bolt to the 
skull, and Cassidy, you will soon find that if you post, you be put 
down, and that the only one in this RPG with any sense is Lurker and 
that you will soon come to regret your ass kissing. Lurker, see you 
in the INCREDIBLY AWESOME DBZSF, MAAAAAAAANNNNN!!!!! And bye to you 
all.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Hop Along Cassidy 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Wednesday, August 07, 2002 2:20 PM
>   Subject: Nice group... ^.^
> 
> 
>   OOC: Hi, everyone. ^_^ I know this is sort of out of the blue, 
but I just felt the need to compliment NBW RPG. It seems like a very 
nice RPG, if you ask me. Most of the writers are very good, and 
their posts seem well written. I really do enjoy looking through the 
posts. Haha, I don't understand a lot of stuff, because I don't know 
much about Neo Beast Wars, but I do like how this RPG is built. You 
guys do an excellent job, and I thought you deserved to hear it from 
someone who's not really in the RPG. ^_^ All of you are quite lucky 
to have such a great owner who keeps the place in shape and 
together. But, what's an RPG without the members? ^.~ Well, before I 
end up writing a speech so long that you guys forget what I'm 
talking about (hee hee, trust me, I can do it... ^_~) I guess I had 
better shut up. ^_^ You guys are terrific! Keep up the good work, 
and support each other so this RPG will last! I just know you guys! 
can do it! *cheers* NBWRPG! NBWRPG! NBWRPG!...
> 
>   With bushels of love,
> 
>   *~-Cassidy-~*
> 
>
